definition: to exist/to deposit/to store/to keep/to survive
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: A: I just got an answer about the stock we have on hand.
sentences.chinese: 我刚刚接获通知我们现有库存量。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets (see article) have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 库存量的快速削减和信贷市场上的临时畸变于事无补。

sentences.english: You have limited reserves of willpower.
sentences.chinese: 你的意志力存量是有限的。

sentences.english: it seems the vacancy rate for the nation's private, commercial housing stock is between 25 and 30 percent.
sentences.chinese: 个人商用存量房空置率应该在25%到30%之间。

sentences.english: The speed and storage capacity of a computer is increasing every day.
sentences.chinese: 电脑的速度和贮存量与日俱增。

sentences.english: Need to display accurate inventory levels.
sentences.chinese: 需要显示准确的库存量。

sentences.english: Decommissioning of the underground diesel oil tanks with a total storage capacity exceeding 200 tonnes.
sentences.chinese: 解除总贮存量逾200公吨的地下柴油油缸的运作。

sentences.english: FDI flow and stock are frequently mentioned in FDI-related studies.
sentences.chinese: 在研究中，FDI的流量和存量常常被用到。

sentences.english: The products use dry ice and liquid nitrogen, stored large quantity of smoke capacity.
sentences.chinese: 平方米，烟雾储存量和热水容量大，升温快。

sentences.english: Perpetual Inventory Method is the basic tool for capital stock accounting.
sentences.chinese: 永续盘存法是资本存量核算的基本工具。

sentences.english: We created a credit-management system to control existing and new loans.
sentences.chinese: 我们创建了一个信控管理系统来控制存量和新增贷款。

sentences.english: A rapid rundown in inventories and temporary distortions in credit markets have not helped.
sentences.chinese: 库存量的快速削减和信贷市场上的临时畸变于事无补。

sentences.english: The structure of industry capital stocks is the refection of regional industry structure.
sentences.chinese: 产业资本存量结构是区域产业结构系统的直接体现。

sentences.english: Really, the only thing you have to have is a good-sized memory card.
sentences.chinese: 真的，你只需要有一个足够储存量的记忆卡。

sentences.english: California, for example, has seen its available foreclosure inventory slim.
sentences.chinese: 比如，加州可供出售的存量止赎房已为数不多。

definition: property or cash held in reserve/stock
